text: Skygirls is a collaborative album between Brazilian musicians Rogério Skylab and Leandra "Voz del Fuego" Lambert, famous for her work with bands such as Inhumanoids! and Lingerie Underground. Also counting with a guest appearance by Onno bassist Eliza Schinner, the album was released in 2009 through independent label Psicotropicodelia. An electronica-inflected release strongly inspired by the works of Franco-British band Stereolab, Skylab states that it is one of his favorite albums, and that he was very proud of making it.Rogério Skylab – Biografia The album can be downloaded for free on Skylab's official website.Rogério Skylab – Skygirls ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Rogério Skylab – vocals * Leandra "Voz del Fuego" Lambert – vocals, programming (track 16), keyboard * Thiago Martins – electric guitar * Bruno Coelho – drums * Eliza Schinner – bass guitar * Solange Venturi – production, photography * Flávio Lazarino – cover art ==References== Category:2009 albums Category:Collaborative albums Category:Rogério Skylab albums Category:Obscenity controversies in music Category:Albums free for download by copyright owner
title: Skygirls (album)
